gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters
Class AdvancedFilter<T,R>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.adapters.AdvancedFilter<T,R>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of objects being filtered.
R - Type of output objects.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformation<T,R>
public class AdvancedFilter<T,R>
extends Object
implements Transformation<T,R>

Filters object against a condition.
The condition is specified in the Filter's constructor. If the object fulfills the condition, then the object is transformed using an adapter specified in the Filter's constructor. For objects that do not fulfill the specified c ondition, the Filter's execute method will return null.
